title: Nos partenaires
headline: Nos partnenaires
content: Il ne nous serait pas possible de présenter l'EUROMAT en 6 langues et 10 pays sans le soutien de nos partenaires partout en Europe:

partners.name: ARGO
partners.description: In the European super election year 2017, foraus’ and Polis180’s new sister think tank, «Argo», sets foot in France. Argo is set out on March 23rd with their official launch press conference, in Paris.

partners.name: PONTO
partners.description: A small group in Vienna brings the grassroots concept to Austria's think tank landscape. Vienna as a melting pot of cultures and its position as a mediator between the «West» and the «East», Vienna as a hub for global politics and last but not least all the challenges in Austria's national political sphere - all that requires a new democratic voice.

partners.name: JEF
partners.description: Naším cílem je silná Evropa, která nám umožní uchovat naše hodnoty i v chaotickém světě.

partners.name: THINKTANK EUROPA
partners.description: We are an independent think tank focusing on European issues. We are dedicated to finding constructive and forward-looking answers to Denmark’s role in the European Union.

partners.name: INSTITUTE for POLITICAL MANAGEMENT
partners.description: Think tank, established with a purpose of researching, developing and applied operation in the field of political management.
